external_games.name: TS Marketplace: Network Southeast BR Class 313 Livery Pack

name: TS Marketplace: Network Southeast BR Class 313 Livery Pack
summary: The Class 313 Network Southeast Livery Pack, which requires the London Overground BR Class 313 EMU Add-on to use, enables you to drive the Class 313 as it appeared under the Network Southeast Sector.The Class 313 was built to revolutionise suburban travel within London.
